channel.title: admin on Prakhar Kulshreshtha
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Prakhar Kulshreshtha

item.description: I’m currently leading a team of ‘intrapreneurs’ under SRIB’s C-Lab initiative. Prior to that I worked in the Samsung-Keyboard team in Multimedia Depth Technology division in Advanced Technology Labs (ATL). I graduated from IIT Kanpur with a Bachelors in Electrical Engineering in 2017, where I worked with Prof. Tanaya Guha on the problem of Online Face Clustering. Going forward I would like to build intelligent solutions which can impact people’s lives in a positive way.
